title: Topic 001 Question 041
body: You have an Azure subscription linked to an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenant. The subscription contains 10 virtual machines that run Windows Server 2019 and host Microsoft SQL Server 2019 instances.
You need to ensure that you can manage the SQL Server instances by using a single user account.
options: Enable a user-assigned managed identity on each virtual machine.
Deploy an Azure Active Directory Domain Services (Azure AD DS) domain and join the virtual machines to the domain.
Enable a system-assigned managed identity on each virtual machine.
Join the virtual machines to the Azure AD tenant.
